title: Andre
creator_credit: George Miller, Annette Handley, Adam Shapiro and Kushner-Locke Production
brief_description: Andre, an adorable seal is orphaned when his mother is caught in a fishing net. The harbour master, his wife and three children adopt the lovable pup and nurse him back to health. Andre forms a special relationship with seven year-old tomboy Toni and the two prove that true friendship can survive the toughest trials.
creator_credit_for_label: George Miller, Annette Handley, Adam Shapiro and Kushner-Locke Production
